English: Kill the Golden Aibatt in dungeons and get drop bonuses!
Polish: Zabij Złotego Aibatta w podziemiach i zdobądź bonus dropu!

English: +30% Exp when it's night in game!
Polish: +30% Doświadczenia gdy jest noc w grze!

English: Sun is here, x1.3 Exp is over...
Polish: Słońce jest tutaj, x1,3 Doświadczenia skończyło się...

English: Complete Eggcellent's Meadow to get Pink Easter Eggs!
Polish: Ukończ Łąkę Eggcellent, aby uzyskać różowe Jaja Wielkanocne!

English: Destroy the stars in the night sky to obtain star fragments!
Polish: Zniszcz gwiazdy na nocnym niebie, aby uzyskać fragmenty gwiazd!

English: Night has come! The stars are coming out.. Find them in the sky!
Polish: Noc nadeszła! Gwiazdy wychodzą.. Znajdź je na niebie!

English: Nighttime has passed, the stars are disappearing.
Spend fewer Dungeon Coins when taking on missions or entering dungeons!
Polish: Wydaj mniej Monet Podziemia przy podejmowaniu misji lub wchodzeniu do podziem!

English: FlyFF Universe is turning 1! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Polish: FlyFF Universe kończy 1 rok! Ogromne podziękowania wszystkim naszym graczom, którzy sprawili to możliwym!

English: Login each day for 40 minutes and receive rewards!
Polish: Loguj się każdego dnia przez 40 minut i otrzymuj nagrody!

English: Reach new levels during the event period and receive rewards! Only on the Flyff World Championship server!
Polish: Reach new levels during the event period and receive rewards! Only on the Flyff World Championship server!

English: Exchange FWC Gear at the [FWC Manager] Ava to get more rewards!
Polish: Exchange FWC Gear at the [FWC Manager] Ava to get more rewards!

English: The #bFlyff World Championship#nb is a global competition held until September 7th, 2023. Join this server with boosted Exp and Drops and attempt to win exceptional prizes!
Polish: The #bFlyff World Championship#nb is a global competition held until September 7th, 2023. Join this server with boosted Exp and Drops and attempt to win exceptional prizes!

English: Earn coins by defeating monsters or completing quests for the Gacha Machine NPC and receive exceptional rewards!
Polish: Earn coins by defeating monsters or completing quests for the Gacha Machine NPC and receive exceptional rewards!

English: Collect Music Notes and Music Score Scrolls from monsters and exchange them to NPC Bach
Polish: Collect Music Notes and Music Score Scrolls from monsters and exchange them to NPC Bach

English: Player Survey! Aim for special rewards!
Polish: Player Survey! Aim for special rewards!

English: It's been a bumper year, so there are a lot of monsters out to get crops.\nIt's time to hunt them down! Can you help?
Polish: It's been a bumper year, so there are a lot of monsters out to get crops.\nIt's time to hunt them down! Can you help?

English: 1.3 Update Survey! Aim for special rewards!
Polish: 1.3 Update Survey! Aim for special rewards!

English: Exchange letters with a loved one or friend to complete the phrases below!!!
Polish: Exchange letters with a loved one or friend to complete the phrases below!!!

English: Let's celebrate for 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!
Polish: Let's celebrate for 2nd anniversary of Flyff Universe!

English: FlyFF Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!
Polish: FlyFF Universe is turning 2! A huge thank you to all of our players who made this milestone possible!

English: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon and own a permanent costume!
Polish: Obtain EXP and event items in the dungeon and own a permanent costume!

English: Complete Daily Quests to earn an opportunity to roll the dice for rewards!
Polish: Complete Daily Quests to earn an opportunity to roll the dice for rewards!

English: Plunder the treasure from the Pirate Ship!
Polish: Plunder the treasure from the Pirate Ship!

English: Login each day for 30 minutes and receive rewards!
Polish: Login each day for 30 minutes and receive rewards!

English: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!
Polish: Increase your life gathering mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!
Polish: Increase your life production mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your whole life mastery gain by 20%!
Polish: Increase your whole life mastery gain by 20%!

English: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!
Polish: Increase your life gathering speed by 20%!

English: Increase your life production speed by 20%!
Polish: Increase your life production speed by 20%!

English: Life Gathering Durability Cost Reduction Event!
Polish: Life Gathering Durability Cost Reduction Event!

English: Reduces by 1 the durability cost when gathering!
Polish: Reduces by 1 the durability cost when gathering!

English: The wandering merchant's renewal will occur 30 minutes earlier during the event!
Polish: The wandering merchant's renewal will occur 30 minutes earlier during the event!

English: Increase gathering objects spawn count by 20%!
Polish: Increase gathering objects spawn count by 20%!

English: The maximum item count in the wandering merchant's shop has been increased by 2 during the event!
Polish: The maximum item count in the wandering merchant's shop has been increased by 2 during the event!

English: Achieve each upgrade level of 1~10 once during the event to receive rewards. Upon clearing all 10 stages, receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.
Polish: Achieve each upgrade level of 1~10 once during the event to receive rewards. Upon clearing all 10 stages, receive an Ultimate Accessory Selection Box.

English: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the discord for more information.
Polish: Rates are increased, dungeon cooldowns are reduced, and more! Visit the discord for more information.
